mapper.select: SELECT r.ProjectPhaseCode, r.ProjectPhaseName, r.RollCode, r.RollName, r.RollID, r.DelongDeptName, r.MasterDesignerName, r.MasterEngineerName, r.RollOwnerName, r.SpecialtyName, r.PlanStartDate, r.FactStartDate, r.PlanDesignedDate, r.FactDesignedDate, r.PlanMutualVerifyDate, r.MutualVerifyDate, r.PlanOutOfRoomDate, r.OutOfRoomDate, r.VerifyEndDate, r.PlanToPublishDate, r.ToPublishDate, r.PlanPublishedDate, r.PublishedDate, r.FactOutOfCollegeDate, r.PlanSentCustomerDate, s.RollStateName as state, vrcf.ExtendedAttribute as wfInst, p.checker, p.headman, p.principal FROM [dbo].[RollEntity] r LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.RollID, MAX ( CASE e.verifyRoleName WHEN '校核1' THEN e.OperatorName ELSE NULL END ) AS checker, MAX ( CASE e.verifyRoleName WHEN '主设人' THEN e.OperatorName ELSE NULL END ) AS principal, MAX ( CASE e.verifyRoleName WHEN '组长' THEN e.OperatorName ELSE NULL END ) AS headman FROM [dbo].ProductEntity p LEFT JOIN EPMS_VerifyOperator e ON p.ProductEntityID = e.ProductEntityID AND e.OperatorDate IS NOT NULL AND e.OperatorDate != '' GROUP BY p.RollID ) AS p ON r.RollID = p.RollID left join EPMS_VerifyRecordCardForm vrcf on r.RollID = vrcf.RollID, ParamRollState s WHERE s.RollStateID = r.rollStateID and r.ProjectPhaseCode = #{number}
SELECT TOP 1 OrganizationId, DesignSize, TaskDate, ProjectManagerAName FROM ProjectPhaseEntity WHERE ProjectPhaseCode = #{number}

SELECT tab.MarketProjectCode, tab.MarketProjectName, tab.MarketProjectID, tab.ContractID, tab.ContractValue, tab.ContractValueOfEstimate, tab.OperatingIncomeRatioID, tab.LastModifyDate, tab.ActivityInstanceId, tab.processInstanceId, tab.PartName, income.money, income.depMoney, ISNULL( income.depMoney, 0 ) / NULLIF ( income.money, 0 ) AS moneyRatio, projv.[value], projv.depValue, ISNULL( projv.depvalue, 0 ) / NULLIF ( projv.[value], 0 ) AS valueRatio FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER ( ) OVER ( PARTITION BY MarketProjectID ORDER BY LastModifyDate DESC ) rn FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT m.MarketProjectCode, m.MarketProjectName, m.MarketProjectID, crp.ContractID, c.ContractValue, c.ContractValueOfEstimate, oir.OperatingIncomeRatioID, oir.LastModifyDate, pi.ActivityInstanceId, wpi.processInstanceId, pi.PartName, pi.PartOrganizationId FROM ZJEPDI.[dbo].[MM_ContractRelateProject] crp, ZJEPDI.[dbo].[MarketProjectEntity] m, ZJEPDI.[dbo].[MM_ContractEntity] c, ( SELECT oir.OperatingIncomeRatioID, oir.ContractID, oir.LastModifyDate FROM ZJEPDI.[dbo].MM_OperatingIncomeRatioForm oir WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM ZJEPDI.[dbo].MM_OperatingIncomeRatioForm WHERE oir.ContractID = ContractID AND oir.LastModifyDate < LastModifyDate ) ) AS oir LEFT JOIN [WorkflowTrackingDataZJ].[dbo].WorkflowProcessInstance wpi ON wpi.BusinessId = oir.OperatingIncomeRatioID LEFT JOIN [WorkflowTrackingDataZJ].[dbo].ProcessActivityInstance pi ON pi.processInstanceId = wpi.processInstanceId AND pi.PartOrganizationId= '6490AEBD-9B6B-48D4-8F36-4C6D17E226EE' WHERE crp.ProjectPhaseID = m.MarketProjectID AND crp.ContractID = c.ContractID AND crp.ProjectPhaseID <> '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' AND m.DeptName <> '发电工程公司' AND crp.ContractID = oir.ContractID AND ( EXISTS ( SELECT pse.MarketProjectID FROM ZJEPDI.[dbo].ProjectPhaseEntity pse, ZJEPDI.[dbo].MM_ProjValSingleSplitOfDept pssd WHERE pssd.DeptID = 'BA1DEBFE-1E6B-4E37-A6A3-0F9FA592C7D3' AND pse.MarketProjectID = m.MarketProjectID AND pse.OrganizationID = pssd.ProjectPhaseID ) OR EXISTS ( SELECT sdr.MarketProjectID FROM ZJEPDI.dbo.MM_SingleDeptRatioRecord sdr WHERE sdr.DeptName = '发电工程公司' AND sdr.MarketProjectID = m.MarketProjectID ) ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT wpi.BusinessId FROM [WorkflowTrackingDataZJ].[dbo].ProcessActivityInstance pi, [WorkflowTrackingDataZJ].[dbo].WorkflowProcessInstance wpi WHERE pi.processInstanceId = wpi.processInstanceId AND pi.PartOrganizationId= '6490AEBD-9B6B-48D4-8F36-4C6D17E226EE' AND wpi.BusinessId = oir.OperatingIncomeRatioID AND pi.ActivityStatus = 7 AND wpi.ProcessStatus = 7 AND wpi.FormId = 229 ) ) AS tab ) AS tab WHERE rn = 1 ) AS tab LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tab.MarketProjectID, SUM ( cs.SplitValue ) AS money, tab.depMoney FROM ZJEPDI.dbo.MM_ContractSplit cs, ( SELECT sdr.MarketProjectID, SUM ( sdr.DeptRatio * cs.SplitValue / 100 ) AS depMoney FROM ZJEPDI.dbo.MM_SingleDeptRatioRecord sdr, ZJEPDI.dbo.MM_ContractSplit cs WHERE cs.ParamSingleID = sdr.ParamSingleID AND cs.MarketProjectID = sdr.MarketProjectID AND sdr.ContractID = cs.ContractID AND sdr.DeptID = 'ba1debfe-1e6b-4e37-a6a3-0f9fa592c7d3' GROUP BY sdr.MarketProjectID ) AS tab WHERE tab.MarketProjectID = cs.MarketProjectID GROUP BY tab.MarketProjectID , tab.depMoney ) AS income ON tab.MarketProjectID = income.MarketProjectID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT p.MarketProjectID, SUM ( pss.ProjectValue ) AS [value], SUM ( pssd.ProjectValue ) AS depvalue FROM ZJEPDI.[dbo].ProjectPhaseEntity p, ZJEPDI.[dbo].MM_ProjValSingleSplit pss LEFT JOIN ZJEPDI.[dbo].MM_ProjValSingleSplitOfDept pssd ON pss.ProjValSingleSplitID = pssd.ProjValSingleSplitID AND pssd.DeptID = 'BA1DEBFE-1E6B-4E37-A6A3-0F9FA592C7D3' WHERE pss.ProjectPhaseID = p.OrganizationId GROUP BY p.MarketProjectID ) AS projv ON projv.MarketProjectID = tab.MarketProjectID WHERE ActivityInstanceId is not null

SELECT p.ActivityId, p.ActivityName, p.PartName, p.PartOrganizationName, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20),p.FinishDateTime,20) as FinishDateTime, e.OpinionContent FROM [WorkflowTrackingDataZJ].[dbo].[WorkflowProcessInstance] wpi, [WorkflowTrackingDataZJ].[dbo].ProcessActivityInstance p, [WorkflowTrackingDataZJ].[dbo].ActivityInstanceExtend e WHERE wpi.ProcessInstanceId = #{processInstanceId} AND p.ProcessInstanceId = wpi.ProcessInstanceId AND e.ActivityInstanceId = p.ActivityInstanceId ORDER BY ReceiveDateTime DESC

SELECT p.OrganizationId, p.EstimateValue, pssd.DeptValueRate, p.EstimateValue * pssd.DeptValueRate as val FROM ZJEPDI.[dbo].ProjectPhaseEntity p, MM_ProjValSingleSplitOfDept pssd
WHERE pssd.ProjectPhaseID = p.OrganizationId AND p.ProjectPhaseCode = #{number} AND pssd.DeptID= 'BA1DEBFE-1E6B-4E37-A6A3-0F9FA592C7D3'
SELECT SpecialtyName, ParentDeptName FROM [dbo].[SpecialtyOfProjectEntity] WHERE ProjectPhaseCode = #{number} AND ParentDeptName LIKE '发电%'

SELECT MM_ContractEntity.ContractCode,MM_ContractEntity.ContractName,MM_ContractEntity.FirstName,MM_ContractEntity.SponsorUserName, MM_ContractEntity.ContractValueOfEstimate,MM_ContractEntity.ContractValue,MM_ContractEntity.NetSettlement, MM_ContractEntity.ContractAttribute,MM_ContractEntity.ContractProperty, MM_ContractEntity.ContractTypeName,MM_ContractEntity.IsOffShore, MM_ContractEntity.ContractState,MM_ContractEntity.CompleteState, MM_ContractEntity.SponsorDeptName,MM_ContractEntity.ProjectClassesSecondName,MM_ContractEntity.ContractID FROM MM_ContractEntity WHERE MM_ContractEntity.ContractCode like '%'+#{search} +'%' union SELECT MM_ContractEntity.ContractCode,MM_ContractEntity.ContractName,MM_ContractEntity.FirstName,MM_ContractEntity.SponsorUserName, MM_ContractEntity.ContractValueOfEstimate,MM_ContractEntity.ContractValue,MM_ContractEntity.NetSettlement, MM_ContractEntity.ContractAttribute,MM_ContractEntity.ContractProperty, MM_ContractEntity.ContractTypeName,MM_ContractEntity.IsOffShore, MM_ContractEntity.ContractState,MM_ContractEntity.CompleteState, MM_ContractEntity.SponsorDeptName,MM_ContractEntity.ProjectClassesSecondName,MM_ContractEntity.ContractID FROM MM_ContractEntity WHERE MM_ContractEntity.ContractName like '%'+#{search} +'%'

SELECT m.MarketProjectID,m.MarketProjectCode, m.MarketProjectName, m.CustomerName, m.TaskResource,m.ProjectTypeName, m.ProjectLevel,m.MarketProjectState, m.IsOffShore, m.Province, m.BuildPlace,m.BuildType, m.DeptName FROM MarketProjectEntity m WHERE m.MarketProjectCode like '%#'+#{search} +'%'
